original_text: The angel said, ‘This is what the Lord says: I promise that this is what I will do for you. You did not try to keep your son safe, but you offered him to me. And he was your only son.
korean_text: 이르시되 여호와께서 이르시기를 내가 나를 가리켜 맹세하노니 네가 이같이 행하여 네 아들 네 독자도 아끼지 아니하였은즉

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says
I promise that this is what I will do for you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 위해 이렇게 하겠다고 약속합니다

sentences.original_text: You did not try to keep your son safe
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 아들을 안전하게 지키려 하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: but you offered him to me
And he was your only son
